name: VectoIDS (m-eprs)
description:
VectoIDS was created in July 2019, written in pure JS.
Inspired by Atari Asteroids, the game features much of
the similar gameplay of Asteroids, with added components and features.

  • Ability to invert colours
  • Ability to turn sounds and / or music on / off
  • Display the current time taken to clear the level
  • Display the accuracy of the player, their shots taken and shots hit
  • Ability to pause the game
  • Multiple input options
  • Hyperspace 
Controls

Controls can be seen when running the game on the homepage and selecting  the header "About/Controls" which is on the top left of the screen. The ship can also be controlled on this homepage if you need to get used to the controls.

How to play

To play the game simply press the "Run game" button, then once the game has loaded in fullscreen, click on the "Play" button in the middle of the screen.

Donations can be sent via PayPal to mariusevans@outlook.com.
